resources.string:
This activity is launched only to activate pause and saveInstance lifecycle events on previously shown activity.


Click anywhere outside to dismiss or press back button.
Launch activity on top\n(pause/save instance - resume)

In order to use this feature, permission 
CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
must be granted.

To do this, please use emulator or any rooted device and execute:
adb shell pm grant com.centralway.rxphoenix.sample android.permission.
CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
from terminal.
